titleStmt.title: Bleak House Volume XVII Digital Edition
titleStmt.author: Charles Dickens

publicationStmt.publisher: TXTDS 404/504 Spring 2025 offering at the University of Washington
publicationStmt.distributor: From University of Washington Libraries Special Collections

bibl.title: Bleak House
bibl.author: Charles Dickens
bibl.note: Published in 20 installations monthly, beginning in 12 March 1852 and ending 12 September 1853. Our edition, No. XVII, was published 12 July 1853.

editorialDecl.p: We choose not to modernize the text, since we wish to preserve the textual impact of the original 1852 publication. Thankfully, the language is not too far removed from what modern readers are comfortable with. Instead, to supply more context, we choose to annotate unfamiliar terms and concepts pertaining to 19th century British legal culture and Bleak House as a larger text.
